free: #e Did all your children come home?
#e (No,) they didn’t. They are all married and returned to the hometown of their spouse in the south.
#c 沒有回來，她們都嫁了，回到南邊（男方）的家。
#e To the home of their spouse. T: Oh, didn’t (they) come home?　P: Yesterday, they visited, (but) left (right away).
#c 回到夫婿的家。T: 啊，沒回到家來嗎？P: 昨天有回來拜訪之後就回去了。
#e P: They would probably come (again) tomorrow night. T: Oh, have you finished (cleaning up your ancestors’) tombs?
#c P: 可能明天晚上又回來了。 T: 妳們掃墓結束了嗎？
#e Not yet, we’re still cleaning. A few days ago we cleaned Mother’s and Father’s tombs.
#c 還沒，我們現在還在整理墳墓。幾天前我們整理、翻修媽媽爸爸的墳墓。
#e The cement cracked and so water leaked inside.
#c 鋼筋水泥裂了，水滲進裡面了。
#c 是的，一樣，我們的也裂了。
#e We have started to work a few days ago.
#e We should be able to finish today. Once we are done, we will kill a pig (today).
#c 今天要完工了。工作完成，趁這個機會（子女都回來），我們今天要殺豬。
#c 早上做好了嗎，還沒好嗎？
#e We already killed a pig this morning.
#c 所以今天要殺豬，早上就殺了。
#e Aciang and Namuh bought the pig.
#c 所以Ofad叫他們吃午餐，就在那邊吃了。
#n ati’可以直接用於口語，叫人家「過來」的意思。
#c T: 剛才嗎？ P: 是阿。
#e So (you’re) going there for dinner later?
#c 等一下還要去哪裡吃晚餐？
#e T: We are going (to clean up) the tombs at 8 o’clock tomorrow. P: To (clean up) the tombs?
#c T: 我們的是明天早上八點去墳墓。 P: 去掃墓嗎？
#e The children don’t have time to come home.
#c 那些小孩沒有時間回來。
#e Nufu (and his family) just came from Taitung.
#c Nufu一家人剛剛從台東回來。
#e (They) didn’t come home; they didn’t have time.
#c 做這一件事你不會累嗎？
#e But I can’t explain in Chinese.
#e If there is something I don’t know, lots of repetitions, right?
#c 如果有不會的地方，持續反反覆覆的說，是不是？
